setup.exitText: Your results have been saved. You can now close this page. Thanks again!

surveyquestion.statement: Hi! First, thank you for your time! Before we start, please enter your Prolific ID.

surveycheckbox.statement: We recommend you use headphones for this test and that you find a quiet environment. Is this the case?
surveycheckbox.option: Yes, I am in a quiet place.

surveystatement.statement:
In this test, you will evaluate the vocal effort of different audio speech samples by rating them on a scale from 0 (soft) to 100 (very loud). The goal is to assess the perceptual effort of each sample in comparison to four references. Please read the following instructions carefully before starting:
1. Listen to the four reference audio samples first. They are identified with a * symbol. Each reference corresponds to a different level of vocal effort (soft, normal, loud, very loud). 2. Evaluate the vocal effort of the four references. A low score means that the sound is soft, while a high score means that the sound is very loud. 3. Listen to each of the 4 audio samples. They are identified with a # symbol. 4. Rate them according to the vocal effort level they correspond to. 5. After rating all the samples, listen to them one last time to ensure you are satisfied with your scores and their ranking (adjust your ratings if needed). 6. Once you have finalized your ratings, click the Next blue button to move to the next set of audio samples. Repeat steps 1-6 for each batch.
The test will take approximately 25min to complete. For the best experience, ensure you are in a quiet environment and using high-quality headphones. Take breaks if needed to avoid fatigue, as it can affect your perception. To access to these instructions during the test, just click on Instructions (top left).
***This test is not compatible with Microsoft Internet Explorer and it must be done on a laptop or desktop computer (not a smartphone or tablet).***
Thank you for your time! Please click 'Submit' to submit your results and exit the test. The prolific completion code is C18D5P5I
